CompoundTargetCalculator - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model
This class uses other classes implementing TargetCalculator in order to cover more complex target position requirements
CompoundTargetCalculator(Map<TargetCalculator, TargetType>) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.CompoundTargetCalculator
This constructors builds a CompoundTargetCalculator given the target calculators it needs
computeTargets(Block, TargetType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.CompoundTargetCalculator
This method returns the groups of Damageable that can be targeted by the Attack solely based on their position relative to the starting point
computeTargets(Block, TargetType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.FixedDirectionTargetCalculator
This method returns the groups of Damageable that can be targeted by the Attack solely based on their position in a straight direction from the starting point
computeTargets(Block, TargetType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.FixedDistanceTargetCalculator
This method returns the groups of Damageable that can be targeted by the Attack solely based on how many moves away they are from the starting point
computeTargets(Block, TargetType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.FixedVisibilityTargetCalculator
This method returns the groups of Damageable that can be targeted by the Attack solely based on whether they can be seen from the starting point
computeTargets(Block, TargetType) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.TargetCalculator
This method returns the groups of Damageable that can be targeted by the Attack solely based on their position relative to the starting point
